Bessent: Congresswoman, that's not true.

title: Democrat rep has a meltdown over Scott Bessett's factual statement about prices, calls it sexist to disagree with her

description:

title: "La manifestante muy grande" calls on LA rioters to bring leaf blowers, tells Trump to suck her left... wait, what?
